title: Judge Blocks President Obama's Immigration Plans, Skills Gap In Wisconsin, Misused Jails
teaser: A new report says nearly 75 percent of people spending time in jail are non-violent offenders, including many homeless and mentally ill. We discuss how the use of jails has changed, and how they can better serve everyone. We also explore how the skills gap is affecting Wisconsin, and talk to an immigration expert about a federal judge's decision to block President Obama's immigration plans.
